title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 82.3 - Crane operators
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 82.3 - Crane operators

State Regulations
A non-refundable fee of $150 shall accompany each
application to the Commissioner of Labor to take the crane operator's exam. Such application and fee shall permit the applicant to take the exam on either
of the next two available dates. Failure of the applicant to take the exam on
those dates, or failure of the applicant to pass the exam, shall result in a
forfeiture of the fee, and such applicant shall be required to submit a new
application fee before being permitted to take the exam. Upon passing the exam, the application fee shall be applied towards the certificate of competence. A
non-refundable fee of $60, payable to the Commissioner of Labor, shall
accompany each triennial renewal of such certificate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
82.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
